proof_script:
lemma poly_fun_sum [simp]: "(\<And>i. i \<in> I \<Longrightarrow> poly_fun (f i)) \<Longrightarrow> poly_fun (\<lambda>x. (\<Sum>i\<in>I. f i x))"
apply (induction I rule: infinite_finite_induct)
apply simp_all
done
